articles.title: EPRA announces new fuel prices amid public outcry
articles.description: EPRA announces new fuel prices amid public outcry. Fuel Levy and EPRA Pricing continues to dominate Kenyan policy discourse as stakeholders weigh in on the implications for ordinary citizens.
articles.content: EPRA announces new fuel prices amid public outcry. The Fuel Levy and EPRA Pricing has been a subject of intense debate across Kenya. Analysts say the policy will have significant implications for the fuel_energy sector. Various stakeholders including civil society groups, business associations, and county governments have expressed diverse opinions on the matter.
